original: 劉備斬夏侯淵，曹軍慌亂...舉張郃為主帥，成功據守漢水。後掌雍州，多次成功抵禦諸葛亮、姜維北伐，致無功而返。
text: Liu Bei cuts Xiahouyuan, Cao Jun panic... With Zhang Yun as the coach, he succeeds in defending Hanshui. In the back palm of Yongzhou, he successfully resisted Zhuge Liang and Jiang Wei's Northern Expeditions many times, and returned without success.
